data.title: Australia's 140 top polluters will set their own limits for future pollution virtually penalty free, according to the Government's latest Direct Action policy paper.
Spain passes law allowing instant fines for taking photos of the police, being "present" in occupied areas.
Astronaut Scott Kelly will return from a year in space both older and younger than his twin brother
A hunter who paid $350,000 last year at a Dallas auction for a license to hunt an endangered black rhino in Namibia will be able to bring home a trophy despite protests from animal rights groups
Israel kills more Palestinians in 2014 than in any other year since 1967
Pilot used an ax on cockpit door
Italy's highest court overturns Amanda Knox murder conviction
Boko Haram headquarters destroyed, Nigerian military claims
Documentary about gang rape wins Indian national film award
